name: myapp
description: Demo application for Jenkins to GitHub Actions migration

scripts.build: echo 'Building application...' && mkdir -p dist && echo 'Build complete' > dist/app.js
scripts.test: echo 'Running tests...' && echo '<testsuites><testsuite name="unit" tests="5" failures="0"></testsuite></testsuites>' > test-results.xml && echo 'Tests passed!'
